Urdu Rich Text Editor

اردو ہے جسکا نام ہمیں جانتے ہیں داغ - سارے جہاں میں دھوم ہماری زبان کی ہے
Switch to Plain Urdu Editor

Steps to write urdu using english characters with HTML formatting.

  • Start typing roman urdu(using english character) words in above box
  • Press space bar and see the word convert to urdu menuscript automatically
  • If you don't get the correct urdu word press backspace button two times and you will get urdu word suggestions then you can select the correct word.
  • Copy the final text written in urdu using Cut/Copy option from Edit menu to get the converted urdu text.
  • You can apply style, formatting from menu bar of the Urdu Rich Text Editor

Typical usage for Urdu Text Editor

  • Use this urdu rich text editor to create text for word documents. Simply right write your Urdu text in above editor, apply your desired styling on text, use Cut/Copy option from Edit menu to get the rich urdu text.
  • Use this editor to generate HTML with Urdu text for your website
  • Use this editor to create formatted Urdu blog post
  • Create Urdu email text with custom style bold, italic, paragraph or headings.
